title: Serious Lag Problems Today
body: Today, I logged onto the Oceania server. I haven't been able to properly connect to a match since then. Is there something going on today? Normally my ping is around 190-180, but today it has been around 230, spiking up to 500. I've barely been able to play matches and I'm just trying to earn enough IP to get a champion. I play on the West Coast of the US. It hasn't ever been a problem before today. I know it's a problem with the server, because I tried the NA server and it worked perfectly. I checked my internet speed, my router, everything is running fine on my end. Is this going to be a permanent change in ping/lag? Am I going to have to pay to move my account to a different server?

replies.body:
Hey there,

Still experiencing this issue? 

What country are you connecting from?
>I play on the West Coast of the US

If you're in the US, your best choice for where you should play would be NA.
